document.full_text: the 20-year-old man accused of being the serial burglar and thief dubbed the "barefoot bandit" must forfeit any book or movie profits from his crimes, prosecutors say in a new indictment in the case.
document.title: prosecutors seek any profits of alleged "barefoot bandit"
lines_and_colors: the 20-year-old man accused of being the serial burglar and thief dubbed the "barefoot bandit" must forfeit any book or movie profits from his crimes, prosecutors say in a new indictment in the case.
